Title: Building AI agents agentic automation agentic AI | ODSP1486
Author: Microsoft Events
Description:
Learn to build Rovo agents with Jensen and Sherif, mastering strategies to create smarter, faster, and seamless agents. Discover best practices for defining use cases, designing action-driven workflows, and solving team problems without coding. Perfect for beginners and experts alike. Key takeaways: Learn the skills needed to build Rovo agents Discover how your team can collaborate effectively with AI agents
